findings.title: No check for zero address
findings.description: In constructor at AggregationRouterV5.sol#L22, there is no check if `clipperExchange` address is zero.

findings.title: Indirect inheritance of receive()
findings.description: The contract inherits from a parent contract that does not explicitly inherit from the intended interface, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Variable shadowing
findings.description: The variable 'reason' is potentially used before declaration in functions _test and testParseWithThrow.

findings.title: Missing NatSpec comments
findings.description: The smart contract lacks NatSpec comments.

findings.title: TODO comment in the source code
findings.description: It is recommended to remove TODO comments before deployment.

findings.title: Typo in the function name
findings.description: At the line UniERC20.sol#L62, there is a typo in "SYBMOL()" . It is recommended to change to "SYMBOL()".

findings.title: Gas optimization by using constant selectors
findings.description: Make sure that selector of the most common functions will be on the top for more gas optimization.

findings.title: Gas optimization by removing len variable
findings.description: The finding suggests optimizing gas usage by removing unnecessary 'len' variables.

findings.title: Gas optimization by using assembly for external calls
findings.description: Optimizing gas usage by utilizing assembly code for external function calls.

findings.title: Unnecessary imports
findings.description: Unused import statements should be removed to optimize gas usage and improve code quality.

findings.title: Unused error
findings.description: The return value by RevertReasonParser.parse(reason,) is ignored in RevertReasonParserTest.testParseWithThrow() function.

findings.title: Missing address zero check
findings.description: In constructor at AggregationRouterV5.sol#L22, there is no check if `clipperExchange` address is zero.

findings.title: More gas optimization
findings.description: Gas optimization opportunity to reduce gas consumption.

findings.title: Different number systems in contracts
findings.description: Lines exceeding maximum length of 100 characters in various contracts and functions.
